SEARCH
Package project.testmaster.backend.service

Class ExamService

java.lang.Object
project.testmaster.backend.service.ExamService
@Service public class ExamService extends Object
Service class that provides functionalities to manage exams and exam sessions. This service is responsible for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting exams, as well as managing exam sessions for students.

  • Constructor Details

    • ExamService

      public ExamService(ExamRepository examRepository, ExamSessionRepository examSessionRepository)
      Constructs an instance of ExamService with the specified repositories.
      Parameters:
      examRepository - the repository used for accessing and managing exam data
      examSessionRepository - the repository used for accessing and managing exam session data

  • Method Details

    • getExamById

      public Exam getExamById(UUID id)
      Retrieves an exam by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the exam to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Exam object if found, or null if no exam with the given ID exists

    • saveExam

      public Exam saveExam(Exam exam)
      Saves the specified exam to the repository.
      Parameters:
      exam - the Exam object to be saved
      Returns:
      the saved Exam object

    • deleteExam

      public void deleteExam(UUID id)
      Deletes an exam identified by the given unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the exam to be deleted

    • updateExam

      public Exam updateExam(Exam exam)
      Updates an existing exam in the repository. If the exam with the given ID exists, it saves and returns the updated exam. If the exam does not exist, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      exam - the exam object containing updated details
      Returns:
      the updated exam object
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the exam with the given ID does not exist in the repository

    • getExamSession

      public ExamSession getExamSession(UUID examId, UUID studentId, short attemptId)
      Retrieves an exam session based on the provided exam ID, student ID, and attempt ID.
      Parameters:
      examId - the unique identifier of the exam
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      attemptId - the identifier of the specific attempt for the exam
      Returns:
      the exam session matching the given criteria, or null if no session is found

    • getStudentExamSessions

      public List<ExamSession> getStudentExamSessions(UUID examId, UUID studentId)
      Retrieves a list of exam sessions for a specific student and exam.
      Parameters:
      examId - the unique identifier of the exam
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      a list of exam sessions associated with the specified exam and student

    • getExamSessions

      public List<ExamSession> getExamSessions(UUID examId)
      Retrieves a list of exam sessions associated with the specified exam ID.
      Parameters:
      examId - the unique identifier of the exam whose sessions are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of ExamSession objects associated with the given exam ID

    • startExamSession

      public ExamSessionId startExamSession(UUID examId, UUID studentId, String passcode)
      Initiates a new exam session for a specific student for a given exam, ensuring all preconditions, such as timing and passcode validation, are met. The method also enforces attempt limits and resumes the previous session if it exists and is incomplete.
      Parameters:
      examId - the unique identifier of the exam to be started
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student initiating the session
      passcode - the passcode provided to validate access to the exam
      Returns:
      the unique identifier of the created or resumed exam session
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the specified exam does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the exam has not started, has ended, the passcode is invalid, or the student has exceeded the maximum number of allowed attempts

    • deleteExamSession

      public void deleteExamSession(UUID examId, UUID studentId, short attemptId)
      Deletes an exam session based on the provided exam ID, student ID, and attempt ID.
      Parameters:
      examId - The unique identifier for the exam.
      studentId - The unique identifier for the student.
      attemptId - The identifier for the specific attempt of the exam session.

    • submitExamSession

      public void submitExamSession(short attemptId, UUID examId, UUID studentId, Map<UUID,String> answers)
      Submits an exam session for a specific student and calculates the total score based on the provided answers or answers already registered in the session if the session has ended.
      Parameters:
      attemptId - the unique identifier of the exam attempt for the specific student
      examId - the unique identifier of the exam
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student attempting the exam
      answers - a mapping of question IDs to the corresponding answers provided by the student
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if the exam session cannot be found based on the provided identifiers
      IllegalArgumentException - if the exam session has already been submitted

    • saveExamSession

      public void saveExamSession(short attemptId, UUID examId, UUID studentId, Map<UUID,String> answers)
      Saves the exam session by updating the student's answers and persisting the session. Throws exceptions if the session cannot be found, has already been submitted, or if the session has ended.
      Parameters:
      attemptId - the attempt identifier representing the specific attempt of the student
      examId - the unique identifier of the exam
      studentId - the unique identifier of the student
      answers - a map containing question IDs as keys and the corresponding student answers as values
